name: The Cure (PhysBoom)
description:
Fullscreen is NOT recommended (normally it would be cool but the UI is off for some reason in it). Check the green slider on the bottom right-hand corner to turn off jumpscares.

Browse through a slew of constantly changing dark-web based puzzles to find the cure!

Type in the answers + ".com" into the web browser to move on to future web pages. Read readme.txt and how_to_play.txt on the computer for more info.

The notepads are editable
